page.title: 17DESCRIPTION OF SCHOOL
page.content: Geoffrey Chaucer School Our school consists of 1200 pupils.There are 65 teaching rooms,two canteens,one for the lower school and one for the upper school.Most teachers eat in the lower school canteen.In the first to fifth years there are seven forms.The sixth years have five forms.Altogether there are 72 teachers,including 3 deputy heads and one headmaster.The daily routine starts at 8:45 when all pupils go to their year assembly.Each year has a pastoral head.40 of the teachers belong to the N.U.T.There are two inside games areas,a gym and a sports hall.We have 4 rugby piches,two cricket pitches and an athletics track.The computer room contains about 15000 pounds worth of equipment.We operate a two-weekly timetable consisting of 50 1 hr. lessons.
